#define DX .19

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U )
{
    U /= iResolution.xy;
    
    O = mod(float(iFrame),10.) > 0. ? texture2D(iChannel0,U)  // do something only every 10 frames
        : U.x < DX ?       // left column :
              U.y < .25 ?      // first image (bottom-left) : 
                U.y > .245 ? vec4(.4)
                           : mix( texture2D(iChannel1,U=U*5.-.1) ,                 // movie
                                  vec4(3)*(sin(35.*U.x)-.6)*(1.+cos(40.*U.y+1.5)), // + decoration
                                  step(.5,max((U=abs(U-.5)).x,U.y)) ) 
                      : texture2D(iChannel0,U-vec2(DX-1.,.25))  // otherwise wrap from prev line
                : texture2D(iChannel0,U-vec2(DX,0));       // otherwise move from prev row
}
